sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-layout row wrap>
        <v-flex xs9>
            <v-btn
                    :loading="loading"
                    @click="onPickFile"
                    :disabled="loading"
                    color="blue-grey"
                    class="white--text"
            >
                {{actionText}}
                <v-icon dark right>cloud_upload</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
            <input type="file" ref="input" hidden name="file" :accept="accept" @change="onFilePicked">
        </v-flex>
        <v-flex xs3 class="right" v-if="removable">
            <v-btn icon flat @click="removeImage" v-if="preview" color="error">
                <v-icon>cancel</v-icon>
            </v-btn>
        </v-flex>
        <v-flex xs12 v-if="progress">
            <v-progress-linear v-model="progress"></v-progress-linear>
        </v-flex>
    </v-layout>
</template>

<script>

    const log = require('debug')('launcher:file-picker');

    export default {
        name    : 'file-picker',
        props   : {
            assetType : {
                type   : String,
                default: 'file'
            },
            label     : {
                type   : String,
                default: 'File'
            },
            actionText: {
                type   : String,
                default: 'Select'
            },
            accept    : {
                type   : String,
                default: '*'
            },
            removable: {
                type: Boolean,
                default: true
            }
        },
        data() {
            return {
                loading : false,
                image   : null,
                progress: null
            }
        },
        methods : {
            onPickFile() {
                this.removeImage();
                this.$refs.input.click();
            },
            removeImage() {
                this.image = null;
                this.loading = false;
                this.$emit('remove');
            },
            onFilePicked(event) {
                this.loading = true;
                const files  = event.target.files || event.dataTransfer.files;

                if (files && files[0]) {
                    let filename = files[0].name;

                    if (filename && filename.lastIndexOf('.') <= 0) {
                        this.loading = false;
                        return;//invalid image
                    }

                    const fileReader = new FileReader();

                    fileReader.addEventListener('load', () => {
                        this.image   = fileReader.result;
                        this.loading = false;
                        this.$emit('input', files[0]);
                    });

                    fileReader.readAsDataURL(files[0]);

                } else {
                    this.loading = false;
                }
            },
        },
        watch   : {
            image(value) {
                this.$emit('pick', value);
            }
        },
        computed: {
            preview() {
                return this.image;
            }
        },
        created() {
            this.appManager.$on(`progress-${this.assetType}`, value => {
                this.progress = value;

                if (this.progress) {
                    this.loading = true;
                } else {
                    this.removeImage();
                    this.loading = false;
                }
            });
        }
    };
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="scss">
    .right {
        text-align: right;
    }
</style>
